schema.description: AICCS实例ID，在智能联络中心控制台上可以看到

视图编码，有以下枚举：
在线：serviceContextViewChatStand
热线：serviceContextViewHotlineStand

RequestId.description: 请求ID，用于跟踪错误原因

203.errorMessage: Failed to call the viewRenderService.Render operation.

500.errorMessage: A system error occurred. Please contact the administrator.

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "Message": "xxxx", "RequestId": "EE338D98-9BD3-4413-B165", "Data": "{\"binds\": {\"hk9xtvX6usP2\": {\"ref\": {\"fieldCode\": \"historyCntOf7\",\"label\": \"7天内服务次数\",\"type\": \"object\",\"boCode\": \"serviceContextObj\"},\"jPath\": \"children\",\"source\": \"data\"},\"hYUi5kwGf0Pm\": {\"ref\": {\"fieldCode\": \"groupName\",\"label\": \"进线技能组\",\"type\": \"object\",\"boCode\": \"serviceContextObj\"},\"jPath\": \"children\",\"source\": \"data\"}", "Code": "Success", "Success": true }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"xxxx EE338D98-9BD3-4413-B165 {"binds": {"hk9xtvX6usP2": {"ref": {"fieldCode": "historyCntOf7","label": "7天内服务次数","type": "object","boCode": "serviceContextObj"},"jPath": "children","source": "data"},"hYUi5kwGf0Pm": {"ref": {"fieldCode": "groupName","label": "进线技能组","type": "object","boCode": "serviceContextObj"},"jPath": "children","source": "data"} Success true","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询服务配置
summary: 根据视图code获取服务摘要信息。
